title: Corrections & Amplifications
text:
Analysts expect Goldman Sachs Group Inc. to bring in revenue of $48.9 billion in 2022, according to FactSet. A chart with a Banking & Finance article Friday about Goldman incorrectly said the 2022 estimate totals $44.88 billion.

(See: "Banking & Finance: Goldman Sachs's Rosy Outlook Falls Shy of '21 Performance" -- WSJ February 22, 2022)

---

Notice to readers

Some Wall Street Journal staff members are working remotely during the pandemic. Please send reader comments only by email or phone, using the contacts below, not via U.S. Mail.

---

Readers can alert The Wall Street Journal to any errors in news articles by e-mailing wsjcontact@wsj.com or by calling 888-410-2667.
